reviewText: This is a wonderful story of an elephant and the boy who loves him. It goes through many scenes and adventures they both have and ends up with a great surprise at the end. I would recommend for everyone!
Title: My Lucky Elephant

reviewText: This DVD was filmed in India and therefore shows beautiful some beautiful forest scenes and plenty of elephants.  The story is gentle, but you do have a couple of "bad guys" in it to spice it up -- of course, throughout, the elephant wins!  I'm planning to give this DVD to my 5 year old grand niece this Christmas.
Title: My Lucky Elephant

reviewText: Watched this with our grand-boys.Really good film about the elephant 'artists' in Thailand. See: http://www.elephantartgallery.com/My wife and I enjoyed it as much as the grand-boys did.
Title: My Lucky Elephant

reviewText: Enjoyed this movie very much,loved the relationship between the little boy and the elephant.Good all round family movie.thoroughly recommend to all.
Title: My Lucky Elephant

reviewText: came in an efficient manner and movie is great family entertainment. and was very please with the movie. whole hartley recommend this movie.
Title: My Lucky Elephant

reviewText: Very entertaining story of a young boy and his elephant.  If you enjoy animal stories, I'm pretty sure you will find this DVD entertaining.
Title: My Lucky Elephant

reviewText: I did not like this movie. It starts out slow & does not get any better. I don't think my kids even liked it.
Title: My Lucky Elephant
